InstallTask.uiDescription: Offline Mode with Interactive Inner Sphere
Base difficulty goes up the more money your mechs are worth. 16,500,000 cbills per half-skull. It counts the most expensive mechs you can drop all at once.
InstallTask.uiName: Difficulty by company strength - Challenge scales with the cost of your mechs

InstallTask.uiDescription: Every planet has its own difficulty rating. Some systems are difficult, some are easy.
InstallTask.uiName: Difficulty by planet rating - Planets never change their skulls.

InstallTask.uiDescription: All mission startpoints are the same as Vanilla
Map start points are randomized
Map Start points are randomized, map size increased by 30%
Map Start points are randomized, map size increased by 60%
Map Start points are randomized, map size increased by 100%
Converts all floaties to a persistent combat log in the upper right corner of the screen
Damage and status effects as floaties around the mech, no combat log
Start the game with pre-defined pilots. They have painted pictures and unused EXP
Start the game with randomly generated, editable, pilots. Ones like you commonly find in the hiring hall.
Content based on and requiring the Flashpoint DLC

Pirated and liberated Clan `Mechs, refitted and rebuild by MechTechs that shouldn't be near them
InstallTask.uiName: Looted Clan Mechs - Arrr be taking this!

InstallTask.uiDescription: UrbanMechs, UrbanMechs everywhere!
!Challenging Content! High-End upgrades of classic 'Mechs
InstallTask.uiName: Custom OmniMechs - Plug and Play Galore

InstallTask.targetPath: PirateTech, PirateTech Flashpoint Module, PirateTech Urbanwarfare Module, PirateTech HeavyMetal Module

InstallTask.uiName: Pirate Tech Units - Laws are there to be broken!

InstallTask.promptText: Challenging Content! This includes extremely powerful random encounters.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, send the Munchkins!;;No
InstallTask.uiDescription: !Extremely Challenging Content! Customs and Pilots that push the limits of whats possible
InstallTask.uiName: Elite pilots and 'Mechs - Lances and contracts to face superiorly skilled forces.

InstallTask.promptText: Challenging Content! This Includes extremely powerful random encounters.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Let's RISC it!;;No
InstallTask.sourcePath: RISCtech module, RISCtech Heavy Metal module, Risc Urban Warfare
InstallTask.targetPath: RISCtech module, RISCtech Heavy Metal module, Risc Urban Warfare
InstallTask.uiDescription: !Challenging Content! Post Dark Age technology, units and combined arms lances
InstallTask.uiName: Republic Institute of Strategic Combat - Black Ops R&D

InstallTask.promptText: Challenging Content! These Behemoths will walk over you if unprepared.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, Stompies!;;No
InstallTask.uiDescription: !Challenging Content! End Game content: Challenging units above 100 Tons, the Leviathans of the modern battlefield
InstallTask.uiName: Superheavies - Oversized 'Mechs&tanks and their missions by LadyAlekto&CargoVroom

InstallTask.promptText: Warning! Everyone will have access to nuclear weapons.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, nuke me from orbit!;;No way!
InstallTask.uiDescription: !Very Challenging Content! Nuclear weapons, they are what they say they are! DO EXPECT TO BE WIPED INSTANTLY!
InstallTask.uiName: Nuclear Weapon Carriers - The RT Team

InstallTask.promptText: Challenging Content! These prototypes will mince you up.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, Bring it!;;No
InstallTask.uiDescription: !Challenging content! Prototypes and experimental technologies
Storyline of the Arano Restoration, as told by Duncan Fisher over some drinks
InstallTask.uiName: Arano Restoration Story as Flashpoint - by Akodoreign

InstallTask.uiDescription: !Very challenging content! Explore a uninhabited asteroid and recover the Black Marauder
Based on the Nebula California sourcebook, series of flashpoints
InstallTask.uiName: Drones of Syberia - Barely canon FP - by Akodoreign

InstallTask.uiDescription: Join the Gray Death Legion facing a ghostly enemy
Pilots that can be hired based on the modding community
InstallTask.uiName: Pilots of the Modding Communty - The BTA Team

InstallTask.uiDescription: A bunch of pink and cutesy emblems
Civilians have not properly evacuated and may be stomped on in their cars. War is a messy business.
Civilians have properly evacuated. Disabled blood spatters and screams
New Fire Fx with reduced smoke
Old Fire Fx with towering smoke plumes.
Vanilla speed of all actions
Speed of all actions increased by 25%
Speed of all actions increased by 50%
Speed of all actions increased by 75%
Speed of all actions increased by 100%
Skips the game's intro and splash screens
Shift+Click Skill tab in the Barracks to retrain a pilot
InstallTask.uiName: Retrainer - Spend 500k Cbills to retrain your pilots

InstallTask.uiDescription: Binds the ESC key action to Mouse4

InstallTask.promptText: This is only for very hard to track bugs, did you get asked to install it?
InstallTask.uiDescription: Enables every Debug Log option Vanilla offers, only required when told to install
InstallTask.uiName: Debug Logger enabled - Only use when told!

InstallTask.uiDescription: No automatic sorting of 'Mechs
Automatically sort your 'Mechs by their cost from highest to lowest
Automatically sort your 'Mechs by their tonnage from highest to lowest
Automatically sort your 'Mechs by their name in alphabetical order
Allows you to select an unique portrait and voice for your Commander during creation
Replaces many Vanilla weapon sound effects with juicier and beefier ones (from Mechwarrior 4)
InstallTask.uiName: Battletech Sound Replacement Pack by Zota6

InstallTask.uiDescription: Automatically skips travel cutscenes when possible
Disables a lot of excssive filters and shaders to offer a cleaner view
Disable Argo ambient chatter
Makes scorch marks permanent instead of fading in 40s
Configure 'Mech and vehicle headlights and add lights to blips
InstallTask.uiName: Better Headlights - Improves and reworks headlights

InstallTask.uiDescription: Colored and unique portraits for every unit by Eternus
Greyscale picture of every 'Mech
Armor damage persists after battle and requires time and money to repair. But base tech points are boosted. The suggested game mode.
Armor damage does not persist after battle. Just like Vanilla. But you have fewer base MechTech points. Training Wheels Mode.
InstallTask.uiName: FREE Armor Repair After Battle - Lower base MechTech points

InstallTask.uiDescription: Install and patch Modtek - REQUIRED
Clears out the cache and settings - Suggested to clean up other mods and other issues

InstallTask.promptText: THIS WILL DELETE YOUR CAREER SAVES \n\nAre you sure you want to do this?;;Yes Delete;;No Cancel
InstallTask.uiDescription: Remove career, skirmish and game settings - Suggested to clean up other mods
Use Vanilla's single-threaded rendering
Use multi-threaded rendering, may increase game performance - Experimental
